text: Marist College of Our Lady of Lourdes (Collège Notre Dame de Lourdes des Frères Maristes) is a comprehensive school, primary through baccalauréat, run by the Catholic Marist Brothers in the Byblos District northeast of Beirut, Lebanon. It traces its roots to a Marist training center opened in Amsheet town in Lebanon in 1903. ==References== Category:Marist Brothers schools Category:Schools in Lebanon Category:Private schools in Lebanon Category:Educational institutions established in 1903
title: Marist College of Our Lady of Lourdes
